titles.title: Commemorating the 100-year anniversary of the fall of Kronstadt, which took place on March 18, 1921.
Commemorating the 100-year anniversary of the fall of Kronstadt, which took place on March 18, 1921.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution commemorates the fall of the Russian city of Kronstadt on March 18, 1921, which marked the end of an uprising against the communist Russian government.
